name: ColorClash
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color clash
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Color Clash is the colorful quiz for one to four players where every answer is a color! 

It's an easy to play game for all the family where you just need to guess the color for each question! Choose a question pack, and then challenge your friends and family to prove your color knowledge in that subject! 

In a multiplayer game each player will take a turn answering a question, score 5 correct to win the game and beat your opponents! In a single player game you can test your color knowledge with 10 questions in a chosen question pack.

Questions Packs include:
- General Knowledge
- Cartoons
- TV & Film

Plus you can optionally extend the fun by purchasing the Extra Questions Bundle to access three new packs:
- Sport
- Music
- Games

After each question just say the color or colors you think are the answer, e.g. "Pink" or "Black and White".

If you'd like to stop a game, you can say 'Alexa, stop'. You will be given the chance to continue the game next time you play.

If you'd like to start over, you can say 'Alexa, start over.'

If you didn't catch something, you can say 'Alexa, repeat.'


FEEDBACK
You can contact us at https://www.hero-software.co.uk
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
